subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 29 points, Dwyane Wade had 12 points and 10 rebounds and the Miami Heat held on to beat the host Philadelphia 76ers, 84-78.
snippet: LeBron James scored 29 points, Dwyane Wade had 12 points and 10 rebounds and the Miami Heat held on to beat the host Philadelphia 76ers, 84-78.
